channel.title: Adding ::master and ::pure
channel.description:
How do you add those commands to a 508 server?
I've tried editing commands.java and when I compile, it gives me an error.

item.title: Adding ::master and ::pure
item.dc:creator: @Username89 Username89
item.description:
@Username89 wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:9, topic:372026”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,347830.0.html[/quote]That doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::master and ::pure
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“dylan mast, post:5, topic:372026”]Go into ur server folder.
Search for client.java.
and add this command.
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“U ar now a master.”);
}[/quote]
Learn to for loop.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) {
    for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
         addSkillXP(486000000, i);
    }
    sendMessage("You are now a master.");
}

Read full topic
